sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_62500_mealplan_recipe"> <x_62500_mealplan_recipe action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>true</active> <cook_time>1970-01-01 00:20:00</cook_time> <cooking_instructions>1. Cook rice noodles according to package instructions. Drain and set aside. 2. Heat vegetable oil in a skillet over medium-high heat. 3. Add thinly sliced chicken breast and cook until browned and cooked through. 4. Stir in thinly sliced bell pepper, julienned carrots, and julienned cucumber. Cook until vegetables are tender. 5. Add cooked rice noodles and bean sprouts to the skillet. Toss to combine. 6. In a small bowl, mix together peanut sauce (peanut butter, soy sauce, lime juice, brown sugar, minced garlic, and minced ginger). 7. Pour peanut sauce over the noodles and toss to coat evenly. 8. Garnish with chopped green onion, crushed peanuts, and chopped cilantro. 9. Serve hot with lime wedges on the side.</cooking_instructions> <cuisine display_value="Thai">8b495a179791021069a3b6fce053afd0</cuisine> <diet/> <effort display_value="Moderate">bee0a76e9730021069a3b6fce053af3e</effort> <image/> <ingredients/> <meal_type display_value="Dinner">ca8516df9751021069a3b6fce053afdf</meal_type> <name>Thai Peanut Noodles</name> <nutrition>Calories: 400, Protein: 25g, Fat: 20g, Carbs: 35g</nutrition> <owned_by display_value="MP Admin">cbb877e697b0021069a3b6fce053af41</owned_by> <pre_cook>false</pre_cook> <prep_instructions>1. Cook rice noodles. 2. Thinly slice chicken breast. 3. Julienne bell pepper, carrots, and cucumber. 4. Chop green onion and cilantro. 5. Crush peanuts.</prep_instructions> <prep_required>false</prep_required> <prep_time>1970-01-01 00:15:00</prep_time> <serving>2</serving> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2024-04-07 01:56:01</sys_created_on> <sys_id>ca5917d797d5021069a3b6fce053afde</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-05-01 06:39:11</sys_updated_on> <time_of_day/> </x_62500_mealplan_recipe> </record_update>
